name: Broken Minds
description:
Broken Minds is an experience, where you explore a story that actually happened in the real world.

You control a 13-15 year old boy named Kevin, who a long time ago, went through a traumatic event.
Your objective is to guide Kevin through this chaotic world called "Voidgloom", and overcome "something" that is waiting for you, and wants to kill you.

that "something" is not your friend, and NEVER WILL BE, and if it is, maybe the worst will happen

(WARNING: This game will try to deceive you as many times as it can)
